comments.commentBody: Technology is allowing and making it easier for both individuals and governments to influence elections of other countries around the world.  Perhaps this is the beginning of what technology will eventually create for the future -- a one government system for the world.
comments.userDisplayName: S a m u e l

comments.commentBody: If there's an innocent explanation for all of this, I'd like to hear it, because I certainly can't imagine what it might be.

Focus on these questions about Trump&co:
"What do you own?
What do you owe?
To whom do you owe it?"
William Cohen, former Defense Secretary and Senator

Everyone in Washington DC that was hired during the Obama Regime should be fired!  We need to get rid of anyone that supported or even affiliated with this Anti-American socialist.  They are the roaches of society that tried to ruin the constitution and destroy the rule of law throughout this land.
Crooked who?

The left just can't fathom that their gal lost the election in stunning style to Trump! So, to delegitimize Trump because we just can't believe Hillary lost to this buffoon, lets create a ruse using our DNC lead press that the Russians "Hacked" the election! So anyone on the left, please tell us how and what the Russians hacked to affect the election? Did they bus in a bunch of commies to vote? Did they dial into all the voting machines in 4 States Hillary was told she would win, no questions asked, and never bothered to campaign in (oh that's right, the voting machines aren't hooked up to the internet)? So, just how did the Russians carry Trump over the finish line in an Electoral Blow Out?

And for all of you hair on fire screaming Sessions lied... the one meeting he had which I guess you can stretch the meaning of meeting if you need, was at a cocktail party along with many other Senators and many other foreign dignitaries. The other meeting was a part of his Senate duties, being a member of the Armed Services Committee! Where there were many other Senators in attendance! He was asked during his hearing about Trump campaign activities of which, he wasn't part of as he was still a ranking Senator in the Senate.

replies.commentBody:
Obamacare. Tens of millions with health insurance.

In case you haven't noticed Republicans control ALL of DC, so not likely we can implement policy at this point. If you are hoping for improvement for America, vote the Rs out in 2018/2010 and we'll get back on the job. Thanks in advance.

comments.commentBody:
Democrats:
The Russians!
The Russians!
The Russians!
It would nice to see the Democratic Party form, promote and implement policy's that are designed to improve America.

Once again, the NYT is big on making accusations based on "unnamed sources". Their credibility and reliability would be greatly be enhanced if they actually produced names. It is hard to investigate anything when you do not have the actual cast of characters to rake over the coals. Very convenient for a media desperate to find fault with someone or something that does not fit with their own agenda.

As for Obama, the sheer allegations of what he and his cronies supposedly did is grounds for an investigation. His typical inaction is disturbing.

Who among the Scheme Trump team were the Kremlin's most useful idiots?

Who among the Scheme Trump team were Moscow's most useful shredders of the American Constitution?

What does Vladimir Putin know about Trump's personal and corporate income tax returns and business records and deals that we do not know?

The assertion that the hacked Democratic National Committee email cost Hillary Clinton the election is absurd. WikiLeaks says it didn’t get the hacked email from Russia, but it doesn’t really matter. The email that hurt Clinton was the classified email stored on her private server. It was the New York Times—not WikiLeaks—that broke the story about the private server. The New York Times cited State Department officials as its source.

https://www.nytimes.com/2015/03/03/us/politics/hillary-clintons-use-of-p...

Name some names.  Provide information that they deliberately worked with the Russians to throw the elections.  Jeff Sessions was a senator, senators talk to ambassadors.  Come on NYT, get the scoop.  Until then stop with the innuendos.

Thank GOD for President Obama and his love for America.
If not for Obama's efforts trash like trump, pense, sessions, bannon, miller and putin might have succeeded in destoryng America.

"Making America Great Again"? Really? If we don't clean up this mess the rest of the world will see us as a joke when it comes to being a democracy that is a model for all other nations.

The GOP loves to invoke the name of Ronald Reagan but Reagan should be spinning in his grave about the head of his party becoming a Russian puppet. Reagan spent his presidency fighting against Putin's "Evil Empire". The GOP needs to finally, at last, put the country before its party. This isn't about politics. The future of our nation's democracy and standing in the eyes of the world is at stake. Here is a time when the GOP can stand up and show its true patriotism.

There are going to be more leaks every day, far more devastating than what has already been revealed. The revelation that Sessions committed perjury is the mere beginning of the revelations we are going to see over the near future.

NYT: Follow the money. The trail begins in Trump's tax returns.

Follow the money.

We now clearly need a special prosecutor to include involvement of Comey and FBI in election shenanigans.  Never thought I would say that I am glad that NSA spies on everyone but they have complete copies/transcript of every communication between trump and sessions, Flynn, manifort, et al., and Russian "diplomats" and "businessmen" and their passing that info back to Putie.  Comey just refused to answer congressional inquiries in closed door house intel committee meeting.  Who is this clown?  J Edgar jr.?

replies.commentBody: No, NBC quoted Sessions' own spokesperson as saying he did not mislead the Senate. NBC itself took no position on the assertion. And the assertion that he did not mislead the Senate is itself suspect, given the source. Sessions didn't need to volunteer that he had "no contact with Russian officials" but he chose to, in response to Franken. The idea that he meant that statement to apply only to his role as a spokesperson for the Trump team, is both bizarre and highly questionable...

No, NBC quoted Sessions' own spokesperson as saying he did not mislead the Senate. NBC itself took no position on the assertion. And the assertion that he did not mislead the Senate is itself suspect, given the source. Sessions didn't need to volunteer that he had "no contact with Russian officials" but he chose to, in response to Franken. The idea that he meant that statement to apply only to his role as a spokesperson for the Trump team, is both bizarre and highly questionable...

I wonder if the Intelligence reveals the true motives of McConnell and Comey, both of whom were in a meeting with POTUS-BHO last September, when he asked the Republicans, represented by McConnell, to join him in releasing a bipartisan announcement to the public about Russia's involvement in the election. Rather than join POTUS-BHO, McConnell defaulted to his eight-year long position of disrespecting the sitting, convincingly elected president, twice, and threatened him. McConnell stated that, if POTUS-BHO went ahead with releasing the information without McConnell, the senator would claim that he was attempting to sway the election in favor of Hillary. POTUS-BHO backed off.

For GOP AND DJT's supporters to claim that POTUS-BHO is trying to undermine DJT (who is doing a superb job of undermining himself with the corruption that is evident in such a short span of time) is ludicrous, and hypocritical, considering McConnell's threat in hiding Russian involvement and Comey's presence in that meeting. All of this has been reported.

POTUS-BHO's officials did what was necessary, considering the corruption in the WH and the attempted cover up by GOP lawmakers. Shameful. Thank you, Obama officials.

This is getting so tiresome.  There is nothing more to report and President Trump did not win with Russia's assistance.  He won the election because he was the best candidate for the presidency.  If Hillary Clinton had won, would be be reading day after day about a Russian interference?  Highly unlikely.  She lost and the New York Times and liberal media are not willing to accept this fact.  Mr. Trump will be our president for four years at least.

If the Russians are such bad guys why is Trump the only focus. Hilary by lack of disapproval allowed 20% of our Uranium to be sold to a Russian company. The former CEO's made large contributions to the Clinton foundation and Bill Clinton gave a half million dollar speech at one of the Russian banks the was involved in the deal. These are not murky shadow connections, these are out in the open deals selling valuable and strategic assets to Russia while getting various benefits.
https://www.nytimes.com/2015/04/24/us/cash-flowed-to-clinton-foundation-...
